    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getAddComment(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to add a comment to the posting, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getAddNegativeReaction(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to add a negative reaction to the posting, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.

    PostingOperations.getDelete(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to delete the posting, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getEdit(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to edit the posting, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getOverrideComment(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to override the permissions of the posting's comments, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getOverrideCommentReaction(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to override the permissions of the posting's comment's reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getOverrideReaction(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to override the permissions of the posting's reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getView(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the posting, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getViewComments(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the posting's comments, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getViewNegativeReactionRatios(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the relative number of different types of the posting's negative reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getViewNegativeReactions(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the posting's negative reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getViewNegativeReactionTotals(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the number of the posting's negative reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getViewReactionRatios(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
    Retrieves the permission to view the relative number of different types of the posting's reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal

    Retrieves the permission to view the posting's reactions, or defaultValue if operations is null or the permission is null.
    static Principal
    PostingOperations.getViewReactionTotals(PostingOperations operations, Principal defaultValue)
